name: Ro-Sea-Bo
description:
A robot cleans an ocean. Only donate here if you have the extra money in your itch.io account, but it's recommended that you donate here: https://teamseas.org/

ALL FUNDS GO TO TEAM SEAS

YO! Please Read: 

The counter: 0/100 is the pollution points you have. You want that as low as possible!

Powerups in this game are based on the total donated to the charity. 

If Donation % 2 = 0 (divisible by 2) then you will receive speed

If Donation % 3= 0 (divisible by 3) then you will receive Magnet Power

If Donation % 5 = 0 (divisible by 5) then you will receive Size

Video: Coming soon
